html:
5.21.17  10:58 am   how do I deal with fake friends

     leave them alone

5.21.17  10:39 am   do you think there is a limit of ideas someone can have?

     no

5.21.17  10:23 am   should I release my creations for free?

     maybe

     what are the advantages?

     it makes it easier for a lot of people to see them

5.21.17  10:10 am   Why didn't you make hotewig a 1:1 ratio with real time?

     because that would exceed the life span of my target audience

5.21.17  9:54 am   I understand that you can't include everything. How did you make the judgments to include/exclude certain things from hotewig?

     all disputes were settled via arm wrestle

     Why is the history so focused on the history since 3000BC rather than the 4.53 Billion years before?

     the video is focused on people, because people are my target audience

     Have a great day :D

5.21.17  9:42 am   do you have a problem with punctuation

     no

      or is it just like your problem with capital letters that isn't a problem?

5.21.17  9:34 am   what is the cure for life?

     even more life

5.21.17  9:32 am   do you ever get one of your own songs in your head

     yes, mainly while i'm working on it
5.21.17  9:31 am   How long did it take to make your latest video
5.21.17  9:29 am   What was your favorite subject in school?
5.21.17  9:21 am   what will you do after the history of the entire world?

5.21.17  8:50 am   Are you suicidal?

     no
5.21.17  8:36 am   Where do you edit ur vids

5.21.17  8:03 am   Is love a kind of gravity?

     i would say so

5.21.17  7:48 am   Any thoughts on Braille?

     if you can see it you probably can't read it

5.21.17  7:41 am   is hotewig a big, medium or small project?

     huge

5.21.17  7:29 am   yo dude, how does one go about .. expressing?

     you just have to start trying different ways. soon you will be on an express train that you don't even remember getting on

5.21.17  6:22 am   Can you say yes without saying yes?

     i think so
5.21.17  6:21 am   Will you respond to this question?
5.21.17  6:05 am   what is your opinion ? ;)
5.21.17  6:05 am   what inspires you?
5.21.17  5:55 am   why didn't you answer me
5.21.17  5:53 am   Can you do a face reveal?

5.21.17  5:21 am   I think people are super frustrated about you not monetizing your content because if they were in your place they would've most definitely. Maybe you should make your patreon more accessible than "other other categories"

     maybe i put it exactly where i want it

5.21.17  5:12 am   why don't you change your site?

     because it is how i want it

     No offense but its pretty ugly and hard to navigate.

     i disagree but i respect your opinion

5.21.17  5:09 am   Why did you write "gravity" at 4:55 in the HotEWIG video when more people are migrating to Mesopotamia?

     because everything is getting closer together toward the place where there is the most stuff. which causes even more stuff to want to go there. i hope that makes sense
5.21.17  4:35 am   how long did your last video take to make

5.21.17  3:18 am   you say "oh hell yeah" when you strongly agree with something, so what do you say when you strongly disagree with something?

     something like "absolutely not" or "no"

5.21.17  2:57 am   Your latest video made me realize with much more clarity the simultaneity of historical events, which seems silly, but it's not easy to comprehend even with the present. What new insights did you acquire during the making of the video?

     i wanna do the songs now

5.21.17  1:52 am   Why do words sound the way they do?

     why would they not
5.21.17  1:38 am   What made you want to get into the video and music making area?

5.21.17  1:19 am   to be or not to be?

     are there any more interesting options

5.21.17  1:07 am   is love evil

     i doubt it
5.21.17  12:56 am   what is your least favorite question to answer?

5.21.17  12:47 am   why dont you upload vid more frequently? it's so funny,thank you,dude. :)

     i am making them as fast as i can

5.21.17  12:00 am   Any plans of releasing a full length album of music anytime soon?

     how about more

5.20.17  11:59 pm   Advice on writing a melody or beginning a composition? I feel like I'm trying to start complex when I really shouldn't be... Thanks!

     there are a hundred thousand ways to write songs. please try everything. start your journey now

5.20.17  11:51 pm   are you proud of me, for existing?

     oh hell yeah!

5.20.17  11:38 pm   ever fallen in love with somebody's voice?

     oh hell yeah

5.20.17  11:21 pm   Do you currently own any stuffed animals you held onto from your childhood?

     yes

5.20.17  11:20 pm   can you explain what your scramble page is? i don't understand what you are doing with the phrases

     anagrams. it's when you rearrange the letters

5.20.17  11:05 pm   let's go sailing in the bermuda triangle

     ah, that sounds wonderful
5.20.17  11:00 pm   is there any particular reason you chose to tell the history of japan rather than any other country?
5.20.17  10:46 pm   Do you make your own music?

5.20.17  10:45 pm   how should i keep myself motivated for a long task that takes many days of hard work, and how do you do it, if at all?

     it really just depends on how badly you want to have the thing done

5.20.17  10:42 pm   what do you think of #11 chords?

     there are a vast array of ways to play a chord which includes a note a tritone away from its root note, any of which may or may not be considered a #11 chord and may or may not be supportive to the song or melody at any point in time. i'm not sure if that answers your question

5.20.17  9:48 pm   Do intelligence and sentience play a role in what it means to be a human?

     i would say so

5.20.17  9:47 pm   Can an artificial intelligence be considered a person

     when it gets good enough to be considered a person, it would no longer be called artificial
5.20.17  9:47 pm   why tf did you make your email so big on the email page?

5.20.17  9:47 pm   have you ever regretted answering something

     yes
